name: Animal Safety
description: Animal Safety => This project is a website which helps us to understand and work on the problems of animals. Ex- Animal Shelter , Animal Foods , Animal Medications , Animal Adoptions , etc .In this project we provide the medication facility according to the need of animal considering the family/type , physic and health of animal .

name: Atmayoga
description: Atmayoga => A project in which we are giving a brief guidence for doing Yoga / Exercises / Meditation for all types of peaple having different age criteria. There is a special login and dashboard for each user and Admin. In this project we provide the yoga plans according to the need of person considering the age , physic and health of user .

name: Portfolio
description: Portfolio => This is a ReactJs Project where I displayed everything about myself in the form of website and anyone who want to see my resume can simply go through this project . This project is the same website where we are currently exploring on. We can also contact by using the contact form given at the bottom of page
